channel.title: aubergine on An Attempt to Organise my Mind
channel.description: Recent content in aubergine on An Attempt to Organise my Mind

item.title: Chinese Egg Plant With Garlic Sauce
item.description: Ingredients Serves: 6 3 tablespoons vegetable oil 4 Chinese eggplants, halved lengthways, then cut into 2cm slices 1 cup (250ml) water 1 tablespoon crushed dried red chilli flakes 3 garlic cloves 1 tablespoon white sugar 1 teaspoon cornflour 2 tablespoons soy sauce 2 tablespoons oyster sauce Method Preparation:10min Cook:15min Ready in:25min Heat the oil in a wok or frypan over high heat. Add the eggplant and stir the eggplant until soft, about 4 minutes.

item.title: Rogan Josh
item.description: Recipe taken from : https://www.you.co.uk/rogan-bosh-recipe/ Ingredients 4 garlic cloves 4cm piece fresh ginger 3 fresh red chillies 1 tbsp tomato purée 60ml water 1 large aubergine 3 tbsp vegetable oil 4 green cardamom pods 1 onion 6 black peppercorns 1 bay leaf 1½cm cinnamon stick 1 tsp sugar 1 tsp ground cumin 2 tsp ground coriander 100g coconut yoghurt large pinch of garam masala handful coriander, to serve handful desiccated coconut flakes, to serve salt Method Peel the garlic and ginger and put them into the liquidiser.
